DataElement.preferredName: Initial Outcome Expectations Questionnaire Perform Daily Activities Post Limb Therapeutic Procedure Recovery Score  4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated expectation of the difficulty of daily activities once they have recovered from their limb treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Initial Outcome Expectations Questionnaire Perform Daily Activities Post Limb Therapeutic Procedure Recovery Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A set of questions and responses designed to evaluate an individual's self-reported initial expectations for recovery after treatment._A question about a person's expected ability to perform daily activities after recovering from treatment for their arm or leg._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Initial Outcome Expectations Questionnaire Score 4 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric scores from 1 (not at all difficult) to 4 (I don't know what to expect) on a Likert scale used on Initial Outcome Expectations Questionnaire.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I didn't know what to expect.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I didn't know what to expect.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual didn't know what to expect.

Concepts.longName: Did Not Know What to Expect
Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual does or didn't know what to expect.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual finds something to be extremely difficult.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual finds something to be extremely difficult.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual finds something to be somewhat difficult.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual finds something to be somewhat difficult.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of non-agreement.: Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.
Something not easily done, accomplished, comprehended, or solved.
